name: GetPidLib
help: Chose the method to enumerate Windows processess and find the PID of a searched process. x64 only because I am lazy. See getpidlib -h for full help
long_help:
Chose the method to enumerate Windows processess and find the PID of a searched process. x64 only because I am lazy.

Available methods are:
- enum
- wmi
- bruteforce
- ntqueryinfo
- ntgetnext
- wtsenum
- thelp32
